original_title: Looking for Rafflesias and Other Fleeting Things
overview: Gubat, a tikbalang, transforms into a teenage boy and searches for the truth. In the mountain, he meets Darren, an American botanist who is looking for rafflesias. His interactions with the American unravel his inner desires that he has never faced before.

production_companies.name: National Commission for Culture and the Arts

title: Looking for Rafflesias and Other Fleeting Things
